summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated Sunday, July 28, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick, annual, AWOL, etc.) for correctional and non-correctional services personnel. The document appears to be a routine administrative record from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as being on 'Sick Leave' from post 'SHU 01' on July 28, 2019, as per the roster's change records.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Routine compilation of staff assignments, shift schedules, and leave statuses for the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: This is an internal staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 28, 2019.
The document records various staff posts (e.g., SHU, CONTROL, INTERNAL, UNIT posts), shift times, and leave statuses including Sick Leave, Annual Leave, LWOP, AWOL, and COP.
One named staff member, Officer 'Noel, T', is recorded as being on Sick Leave.
The roster indicates a total of 109 Correctional Services staff and 10 Non-Correctional Services staff were scheduled, with 23 overtime and 2 compensatory time occurrences.
The document is a standard administrative record, providing a snapshot of jail operations on a specific date relevant to the Epstein case timeline.
